S

sauvgardeIndexation(String) - Method in class SystemSolaire.SaveHtmlProg
this method can generate a Ser File serial file which Contain the ArrayList of HtmlFile Serialization is a process introduced in JDK version 1.1 that makes it possible to create an object or object graph of the JVM persistent for storage or exchange and vice versa
sauvgardeIndexationJar(String, String) - Method in class SystemSolaire.SaveHtmlProg
*it's the same method as sauvgardeIndexation but here we use it in the console mode because in the console model at each execution we leave the code so the ArrayList of HtmlFile will be empty so in this case we have to re-brows the directory to generate the Indexation
sauvgardeSiteMap(String, String, String) - Method in class SystemSolaire.SaveHtmlProg
this method can genre a site map by using the method of writing in GeneratSiteMap
sauvgardXml(File) - Method in class SystemSolaire.GeneratSiteMap
this method can create a Sitemaps which is an easy way for web masters to inform search engines about pages on their sites that are available for crawling.
SaveHtmlProg - Class in SystemSolaire
SaveHtmlProg is a Java Class whit it we can generate a sitemap.xml and the indexation of the Html Files by giving the file of departure which contains all the pages.
SaveHtmlProg() - Constructor for class SystemSolaire.SaveHtmlProg
Construct and initialize a SaveHtmlProg , we initialize the ArrayList of HtmlFile and initialize the GeneratSiteMap by using her Construct.
setFreq(String) - Method in class SystemSolaire.SiteMap
change the frequency of this SiteMap
setLastmod(long) - Method in class SystemSolaire.SiteMap
change the last modification of this SiteMap
setLoc(String) - Method in class SystemSolaire.SiteMap
change the location of this SiteMap
setPriority(float) - Method in class SystemSolaire.SiteMap
change the priority of this SiteMap
SiteAlreadyExistsException - Exception in SystemSolaire
SiteAlreadyExistsException represent an exception which is thrown when to instance of SiteMap are equals
SiteAlreadyExistsException(String) - Constructor for exception SystemSolaire.SiteAlreadyExistsException
Contracts and initializes this exception with a message
SiteMap - Class in SystemSolaire
SiteMAp is a Java Class SiteMap represent a part of a sitemap.xml file which has four parameters (location,priority,last-modification)
SiteMap(String, long, String) - Constructor for class SystemSolaire.SiteMap
constructs and initializes a SiteMap on (loc,lastmod,freq) also initialize his priority on 0.5
SiteMap(String, String, float, long) - Constructor for class SystemSolaire.SiteMap
constructs and initializes a SiteMap on (loc,freq,priority,lastmod)
SiteMap(String, long) - Constructor for class SystemSolaire.SiteMap
constructs and initializes a SiteMap on (loc,lastmod) also initialize his priority on 0.5
